acf.sub_title: We're group of Magento Freelancer working together to offer agency level service at freelancer rates.

developers.name: Vishal Patel
developers.content: Vishal Caldwell is a seasoned Magento freelancer with a passion for crafting bespoke e-commerce solutions that drive business growth. With extensive experience in Magento development, Vishal excels in creating tailored solutions that address the unique challenges of each client. Her expertise ranges from developing custom extensions to optimizing Magento stores for peak performance. Vishal’s approach is deeply rooted in understanding client needs and translating them into effective Magento strategies. Her dedication to delivering high-quality, scalable solutions ensures that businesses can thrive in the competitive e-commerce landscape. Whether it’s a complete site overhaul or targeted enhancements, Vishal is committed to achieving exceptional results with Magento.

developers.name: Mike Thomas
developers.content: With over a decade of experience in the e-commerce landscape, Mike Thomas has become a recognized expert in Magento development. His journey began with a passion for coding and a drive to create seamless online shopping experiences. Specializing in custom Magento solutions, Thorne has a track record of transforming complex business requirements into user-friendly, high-performance online stores. From intricate module development to robust site migrations, Thorne’s deep knowledge of Magento’s ecosystem ensures that each project not only meets but exceeds client expectations. His dedication to staying abreast of the latest Magento advancements allows him to deliver cutting-edge solutions tailored to the unique needs of each business.

developers.name: Arpan Patel
developers.content: Arpan Hawthorne brings a wealth of experience to Magento development, with a career spanning over 15 years. His expertise lies in harnessing the power of Magento to build scalable and innovative e-commerce platforms. Arpan’s approach combines a thorough understanding of Magento’s core functionalities with a strategic vision for enhancing user engagement and boosting sales. Known for his meticulous attention to detail and problem-solving skills, Arpan has successfully managed numerous Magento projects, from designing custom themes to optimizing site performance. His commitment to leveraging Magento’s full potential has helped countless businesses achieve their online goals with efficiency and excellence.

services.title: Magento Upgrade Service
services.description: Keep your Magento store current with the latest features, security patches, and performance improvements. Our upgrade service ensures a smooth transition to new versions, minimizing downtime and enhancing your store’s functionality and security.

services.title: Magento Support
services.description: Receive expert technical support to resolve issues, troubleshoot errors, and maintain your Magento store’s optimal performance. Our support service ensures your store operates smoothly, providing peace of mind with prompt and efficient solutions.

services.title: Magento Performance Optimization
services.description: Boost your Magento store’s speed and efficiency with targeted performance enhancements. Our optimization service focuses on caching, indexing, and database tuning to ensure a faster, more responsive shopping experience for your customers.

services.title: Magento Development Service
services.description: Get custom Magento solutions tailored to your business needs. Our development service includes creating custom modules, themes, and functionality to enhance your store’s capabilities and provide a unique online shopping experience.

services.title: Magento Migration Service
services.description: Seamlessly transition your store from other platforms or older Magento versions to the latest release. Our migration service ensures minimal downtime and data integrity, delivering a smooth and efficient upgrade to the newest Magento version.

services.title: Magento Security Audit
services.description: Safeguard your Magento store with a comprehensive security audit. We identify vulnerabilities, implement essential security patches, and enhance your store’s protection against potential threats to ensure a secure online shopping environment.

testimonials.title: — Michael Thompson, E-Commerce Manager
testimonials.description: “The Magento freelancer we worked with transformed our store with their deep understanding of Magento’s complex architecture. Their custom solutions significantly improved our store's performance and efficiency. We experienced a noticeable boost in customer satisfaction. Highly recommended!”

testimonials.title: — Emily Johnson, Online Retailer
testimonials.description: “The support and development services provided were outstanding. From handling critical updates to optimizing performance, their attention to detail and commitment to quality were exceptional. Their prompt solutions greatly enhanced our online presence.”

testimonials.title: — James Wilson, Digital Marketing Director
testimonials.description: “We engaged a Magento freelancer for a major migration project, and the results were impressive. Their expertise ensured a smooth transition with minimal disruption. Quick troubleshooting and proactive optimization made a significant difference to our operations.”

porthfolio.title: Active Distro
porthfolio.description: Active Distributors offer a wide range of products from C-STORE including CBD, disposable devices/pods, e-liquid/salt nic, glass and silicone pipes, hookah, kratom, lighters and torches, nicotine pouches, novelties, rolling paper/filters, smoke accessories, and vaporizers/hardware. Their goal is to provide our customers with the highest quality products at affordable prices. They understand that smoking and vaping preferences vary from person to person, which is why we offer a diverse range of products to cater to everyone’s individual needs.

porthfolio.title: Parts4cells
porthfolio.description: Parts4Cells.com is a reliable and trusted B2B online source for a wide range of high-quality cell phone replacement parts and accessories. They offer an extensive selection of parts for various cell phone models, including LCD screens, batteries, charging ports, and more. Their products are carefully selected and tested to ensure their quality and compatibility, and they provide fast and affordable shipping.

porthfolio.title: IMWW.nl
porthfolio.description: IMWW.nl, a leading distributor of industrial equipment, sought to revamp its online presence with a new website to enhance user experience and boost sales. Mage Monkeys stepped in with their expertise in Magento development, crafting a robust e-commerce platform tailored to IMWW.nl’s needs. Implementing Huva, a sophisticated theme, Mage Monkeys ensured seamless navigation and aesthetic appeal. The result: a 30% increase in online orders within the first quarter, improved customer engagement, and streamlined backend operations. IMWW.nl now stands as a testament to Mage Monkeys’ prowess in elevating e-commerce solutions for industrial sectors.

porthfolio.title: Imedicale
porthfolio.description: iMedicale Store was created to become one of the most important online distributors of professional medical products and medical equipment in Romania. Our company takes into account the needs of our clients and aims to offer them complete services of the best quality: Distribution of medical supplies, disinfectants and medical equipment for medical offices, medical clinics, hospitals and individuals. Specialized technical assistance and advice for all commercialized products. Providing a very wide range of products for each category.

porthfolio.title: Karoe
porthfolio.description: Karoe.nl is a leading on stop shop for the hunter, angler and outdoorsman to buy stylish outdoor clothing, articles and shoes. Karoe.nl is a dealer of the quality brands like Härkila, Seeland, Sasta, Swedteam and Deerhunter. Karoe.nl sale products physically through their branches and with partners in the Netherlands, Belgium, Germany and Scandinavia. Karoe.nl wants to extend their customer reach through the digitally and decided to sell their products online. Karoe.nl having an idea of their need, which wasn’t that big of a deal for our team. We started understanding the loopholes. After having a deep understanding and analysis of the same, the team started exploring the future scope. Once the team had challenges handy, time was to find and implement the solution. We have successfully managed to achieve a full-functional ecommerce site with flawless coding & beautiful theme and delivered as expected by the client. A few key considerations included building a mobile centric design, adding stars to responsiveness and custom work performed for homepage, product categorisation, product listing page, product detail page, single checkout page to enhanced customer experience and dashboard page for getting quick view of the site.

porthfolio.title: EPCO
porthfolio.description: Since its establishment in 1994, EPCO has become a major provider of high-quality PVC & ABS thermoplastic piping. EPCO wanted to increase their reach to the market and decided to revamp their ecommerce website, EPCO approached us to revamp ecommerce portal that facilitate them to make a reach of their product.
